Toto's Soundlab

Music, Sound Design and Creative Technology

This Jekyll theme is based on the free design by Nina Petropoulos on Github

Welcome To The Lab!

I’m Tommi Toivonen, a Helsinki-based musician, sound designer, creative technologist with years of sound design and music composing experience for short films, games and art installations. I currently work at VILD Music as a sound designer and composer.

I love to experiment with new interfaces for music composition, sound design and performance control. I play my own UFO and have two bands: Phantom and Kitkaliitto.
